unnormalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Stir Up Kitchen Heat Ahead of Diwali!**
normalised: **Gas Cylinder Prices Stir Up Kitchen Heat Ahead of Diwali!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, energy bills got you down? Especially with Diwali around the corner and all that gulab jamun to make? Well, guess what? Your LPG cylinder price just saw another round of... well, let's just say itâ€™s not good news.
normalised: Hey folks, energy bills got you down? Especially with Diwali around the corner and all that gulab jamun to make? Well, guess what? Your L P G cylinder price just saw another round of... well, let's just say it's not good news.

unnormalised: This week, Indian Oil, Bharat Petroleum, and HPCL quietly nudged up prices again. We're talking roughly Rs. 50 per cylinder this time, pushing the subsidized cylinders closer to the Rs. 950 mark in Delhi.
normalised: This week, Indian Oil, Bharat Petroleum, and H P C L quietly nudged up prices again. We're talking roughly rupee fifty per cylinder this time, pushing the subsidized cylinders closer to the rupee nine hundred and fifty mark in Delhi.

unnormalised: Analysts are saying global crude oil prices are to blame, but that doesn't make the pressure cooker any less, well, pressurized, right? Think about all those delicious biryani preparations for the festival!
normalised: Analysts are saying global crude oil prices are to blame, but that doesn't make the pressure cooker any less, well, pressurized, right? Think about all those delicious biryani preparations for the festival!

unnormalised: Consumers in Mumbai and Chennai are facing similar hikes, and the frustration is palpable.
normalised: Consumers in Mumbai and Chennai are facing similar hikes, and the frustration is palpable.

unnormalised: "This is madness!" exclaimed Lakshmi, a homemaker from Bengaluru. "How are we supposed to manage when everything else is also getting expensive?"
normalised: "This is madness!" exclaimed Lakshmi, a homemaker from Bengaluru. "How are we supposed to manage when everything else is also getting expensive?"

unnormalised: The government is reportedly considering new measures to ease the burden, but so far, nada. So, buckle up folks, and maybe consider cooking up a storm with a little less gas this Diwali! Let's hope for some relief soon, otherwise, that festive season will be a bit less festive for many.
normalised: The government is reportedly considering new measures to ease the burden, but so far, nada. So, buckle up folks, and maybe consider cooking up a storm with a little less gas this Diwali! Let's hope for some relief soon, otherwise, that festive season will be a bit less festive for many.
